proof:
Proof. By Lemma 3.4, $|P_i| \le \lceil \frac{n_i}{\lceil n_i \Delta^2 / n \rceil} \rceil \le \frac{n_i}{n_i \Delta^2 / n} + 1 \le \frac{2n}{\Delta^2} + 1 \le \frac{3n}{\Delta^2}$.
The second inequality is true because $\frac{n_i \Delta^2}{n} \ge 1$. The last inequality is true by $\Delta < \sqrt{n}$.
